definition: (of speech sounds) forming the nucleus of a syllable
details:
adjective
- (of speech sounds) forming the nucleus of a syllable
= example: (of speech sounds) forming the nucleus of a syllable
- consisting of a syllable or syllables
- having lines based on the number of syllables rather than on rhythmical arrangement of stresses or quantities
= example: having lines based on the number of syllables rather than on rhythmical arrangement of stresses or quantities
- consisting of or using a syllabary
= example: consisting of or using a syllabary
- of or relating to syllables
= example: of or relating to syllables
